title: Kopf Salat
description: Serves meat, veg options available. A build-your-own salad bar with a huge selection of toppings (no tofu). Some sandwiches including one vegetarian one with grilled veggies (vegans to check). Looks small from outside but actually lots of seating inside with a nice cafe atmosphere. Located 50 meters from the U-Bahn stop Appellhofplatz in the center of Koeln.
